metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18860 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Squid before 4.9, when certain web browsers are used, mishandles HTML inthe host (aka hostname) parameter to cachemgr.cgi.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11
squid-cgi - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11
squid-common - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11
squid-purge - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11
squid3 - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11
squidclient - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.12-1ubuntu7.11').
